title: Agentic Coding: How Google’s Jules Compares to Claude Code
author: David Eastman
description: Google's version of an agentic coding tool that isn't IDE-based is Jules. We look at how it works and how it compares to Claude Code.
cntitle: Agentic Coding：Google 的 Jules 与 Claude Code 的对比
cndescription: Google推出的非基于IDE的agentic编码工具是Jules。我们将了解它的工作原理，以及它与Claude Code的比较。
